name: Saloon Standoff
description:
Welcome to the Saloon!

This game is a version of an outdoor real-life children's game (don't know how to describe better) (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GlNRdiqPwXA&ab_channel=CleberJuniorSouRecreador).

You have 3 actions:

- Load --> Only 1 bullet max  (Mobile: Button / Keyboard: "R" or Button)

- Shoot --> Shoot others or shoot the Cage! (Mobile: Touch it / PC: Click it)

- Dodge --> Dodge bullets and move towards the Cocktail!  (Mobile: Button / Keyboard: "Space" or Button)

Win conditions:

  • Be the only survivor
  • Get the Cocktail in the center of the room.

To get the Cocktail, someone must break the Cage.

To break the Cage, one player, any player, must shoot it once.

After getting close to the Cocktail ("Dodge"s), you must finally "Load" to get it. But beware: you will be vulnerable!

That's all! If I've forgotten piece of information, pls comment!

Have fun! Thanks!

------------------

There is a Mobile Build (for ANDROID) for this game. If you wish to play on your smartphone, pls download the APK below!! "saloon_standoff_v1.apk"

To install it: 

  1. send the .APK file to your phone (via cable probably)
  2. Got to File Manager > Recent (or search for its name)
  3. Click the file and accept to install from unknown sources ( or something like that)

Here's refs: 

  • https://stackoverflow.com/questions/9718104/how-to-install-apk-from-pc
  • https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vK_jgnEe_8w&ab_channel=Fleofl
